f[x_, y_] := x^2 + y^2 gradient[x_, y_] := {2x, 2y} Show[ Plot3D[f[x, y], {x, -2, 2}, {y, -2, 2}, PlotRange -> {0, 8}, AxesLabel -> {"x", "y", "f(x, y)"}, MeshFunctions -> {#3 &}, MeshStyle -> {{Thick, Red}}, Lighting -> "Neutral"], VectorPlot[gradient[x, y], {x, -2, 2}, {y, -2, 2}, VectorStyle -> {{Thick, Blue}}, VectorPoints -> 10] ]
